shipping.shipping_method_notice: INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS PLEASE NOTE: If you are purchasing from outside Australia, your government may require you to pay customs import duty when delivered. You are responsible for paying customs duty if charged by your government. andAndrea is legally required to declare the full sale value of international orders and to attach an invoice. Contact your local customs office to determine if duties or taxes are applicable and whether you can take advantage of any tax free threshold. andAndrea does not accept any costs for Returns caused by customers refusing to pay their government’s import duty and two-way shipping costs will be deducted from any refunds caused in this way.

shipping_method_not_available_generic.one: This order is below our minimum of AUD $100.00 (approx USD $75.00). Orders above our minimum always receive FREE Shipping
shipping_method_not_available_generic.other: Unfortunately, we can’t deliver to the address you entered. This could be because one or more fields are incorrect or you may be from a jurisdiction our country won’t allow us to ship to (e.g. Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Syria, Crimea, Sudan, South Sudan, North Sudan, Indonesia, Russia, Brazil, Central African Republic, Congo, Iraq, Kuwait, Libya, Mali, Somalia, UAE, Venezuela, Yemen).

shipping_method_not_available_updated.one: This order is below our minimum of AUD $100 (approx USD $75.00). Orders above our minimum always receive FREE Express Shipping
